Title: EntitiesToDTOs - Entity Framework DTO Generator
Description:
EntitiesToDTOs is an Entity Framework DTO generator used as an AddIn for Visual Studio.
You'll no longer have to create DTOs for all your entities!
HomeWiki:
12000 total downloads and counting!

See reviews of: v3.1, v2.0, v1.1.

v3.2 has been released!
  • Fixed Work Item 1003
  • Fixed Work Item 1044
  • Fixed Work Item 1143

v4.0 is on the pipe... stay tuned! (back on Feb14 with updates on this)
  • Remove "Your ad here" :)
  • Choose DTO properties to generate
  • Optionally use interfaces in entities and DTOs
  • Support EDMX generated by Entity Framework Power Tools (indirect Code-First support)
  • Support Visual Studio 2013
  • Support Entity Framework 6
  • Include/Exclude timestamp on generated files
  • Create folders from the E2DTO dialog
  • Request your feature!
  • or discuss new features with the community!


What is EntitiesToDTOs?
EntitiesToDTOs is an Entity Framework DTO generator used as an AddIn for Visual Studio.
You'll no longer have to create DTOs for all your entities!
Download your copy today and get started reading the documentation.
If you want to request a feature or you find a bug, please inform me of that using the Issue Tracker.
See the complete list of Features.
